first_para: Aidan Burley (born 22 January 1979) is a British politician. He was Member of Parliament for Cannock Chase from 2010 to 2015.

full.extract: Aidan Burley (born 22 January 1979) is a British politician. He was Member of Parliament for Cannock Chase from 2010 to 2015.
full.title: Aidan Burley
